Articles.Content:
With 0.90 I was able to run several rather heavy mods and by several and I mean a lot and KSP was running without any problem, now however after 1.0 it can't run even Tantares LV without crashing at some point. I had someone look at it who works with computers for a living and he noticed that it's a pretty severe bug but I don't know what it is or how to fix it. Suggestions would be greatly appreciated.

Also if anyone can tell me where I might be able to find the crash logs that would also be greatly appreciated because as far as I know, Squad removed that folder, either that or I'm looking in the wrong places.

Also if anyone can tell me where I might be able to find the crash logs that would also be greatly appreciated because as far as I know, Squad removed that folder, either that or I'm looking in the wrong places.

You are looking KSP.log in the main folder.

No, you're looking for "~/.config/unity3d/Squad/Kerbal Space Program/Player.log"

KSP.log might be useful, but it's incomplete re Player.log.

Look here for generic bug reporting instructions and file locations.

If it's native code crashing, you'll see it in STDOUT/STDERR when run from a terminal.

If this is the case, get a backtrace , but note that there's a limit to what we humble users can do with it as Unity doesn't come with debug symbols (and recompiling mono for the same is a little painful).
